basic.color: Leaf color green , flower color white to yellow green

maintenance.soil: No strict requirements on the soil
maintenance.sunlight: Like shade environments, put in cool and ventilated places
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Fertilization not much required, dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply fertilizers once in each month in spring
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
